com.giift.sdk.data

Class Coupon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giift.sdk.data.Coupon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.provider.BaseColumns

    public class Coupon
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.provider.BaseColumns
    A coupon is a kind of best deal. It can be attached to a Card or to a Dmo

public static java.lang.String GetIdFromUri(@NonNull
                                                      android.net.Uri uri)
        Get a coupon id from its uri
        Parameters:
        uri - Uri to be decompiled
        Returns:
        id of the coupon if it is a valid card url, null otherwise

      • BuildUriFromObject

        @Nullable
public static android.net.Uri BuildUriFromObject(@NonNull
                                                           android.content.Context context,
                                                           @NonNull
                                                           java.lang.String objectId)
        Get the uri of all coupons, within the GiiftProvider, linked to an object. An object can be a card id or a dmo id.
        Parameters:
        objectId - id of the card or of the dmo
        Returns:
        uri of the coupons within the GiiftProvider
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider

      • UpdateFromJSon

        public static android.net.Uri UpdateFromJSon(@NonNull
                                             android.content.Context context,
                                             @NonNull
                                             org.json.JSONObject obj,
                                             @NonNull
                                             java.lang.String objectId)
        Update/Insert the definition of a coupon from its JSON representation, into the GiiftProvider
        Parameters:
        context - used to access the GiiftProvider
        obj - json representation of the coupon
        objectId - card id or dmo id to which the coupon should be linked.
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider
